Module com.alike
Package com.alike.read_write

Class CoordinateListFileWriter

java.lang.Object
com.alike.read_write.CoordinateListFileWriter
public class CoordinateListFileWriter extends Object
Class contains functionality to handle writing graphs into file by constructing lists of coordinate objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CoordinateListFileWriter()
    Constructs a new instance that can be used to edit the coordinate list file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    appendCoordinateList(BufferedWriter bw, ArrayList<Coordinate> cL)
    Used to append a new coordintae list to the bottom of the coordinate list file.
    void
    clearFile()
    Use to remove all information from the file at file path.
    void
    close()
    Closes the buffered writer.
    void
    populateFile()
    Used to repopulute the graph list with randomized graphs and the regular graphs.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CoordinateListFileWriter

      public CoordinateListFileWriter() throws IOException
      Constructs a new instance that can be used to edit the coordinate list file.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if io throws an error.

  • Method Details

    • appendCoordinateList

      public void appendCoordinateList(BufferedWriter bw, ArrayList<Coordinate> cL) throws IOException
      Used to append a new coordintae list to the bottom of the coordinate list file.
      Parameters:
      cL - The new coordinate list to append.
      bw - The BufferedWriter to write into.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an io error is thrown.

    • clearFile

      public void clearFile() throws IOException
      Use to remove all information from the file at file path.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an io error is thrown.

    • populateFile

      public void populateFile() throws IOException, InvalidGraphException, NodeSuperimpositionException, RadiusExceedingBoundaryException
      Used to repopulute the graph list with randomized graphs and the regular graphs.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown by the buffered reader.
      InvalidGraphException - Thrown if an attempt is made to create a graph with less than 3 nodes.
      NodeSuperimpositionException - Thrown if an attempt is made to create a graph with superimposed nodes.
      RadiusExceedingBoundaryException - Thrown by @code{generateIrregularPolygonGraph()} if an attempt is made to stretch a polygon out of the display area.

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes the buffered writer.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if the bw fails to close.
